text: Zhao Chen (born 24 June 1989) in Shenyang is a Chinese international handballer, who plays for Croatian club RK Zamet. As an international for the China national handball team he has competed at the 2010 Asian Games, 2010 Asian Championship, 2012 Asian Championship, 2014 Asian Championship, 2016 Asian Championship and 2018 Asian Championship ==References== ==External links== * Rk-zamet.hr Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Shenyang Category:Handball players at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Sportspeople from Rijeka Category:RK Zamet players Category:Chinese male handball players Category:Handball players from Liaoning Category:Asian Games competitors for China
title: Zhao Chen
